content: *this lace layette set includes a blanket booties hat and cardigan lion brand yarn * skill level intermediate level 3 size 3-6 mos 12 mos 24 months 2 yrs finished chest 18 22 26 inches 45 5 56 66 cm finished length 10 12 14 inches 25 5 30 5 36 5 cm hat and booties one size blanket 22 x 33 in 56 x 84 cm gauge sweater hat and booties 24 stitches + 32 row = 4 in 10 cm in eyelet pattern with size 4 3 5 mm needle blanket 22 stitches + 34 row = 4 in 10 cm in eyelet pattern with size 6 4 mm needle babysoft® article #920 4 balls *materials are sufficient to make all items in the set * knitting needles - size 3 3 25 mm circular needle size 4 3 5 mm 24 in 60 cm long circular needle size 6 4 25 mm 24 in 60 cm long 3 buttons 1/2 in 13 mm diameter written pattern schematic provided for sweater available in different versions 10286 aqua layette set 1 *kbs-aqualayette pdf* corrections applied mar 30 2003 90060ad lullaby layette 2 corrections applied jun 29 2010 *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www lionbrand com/knitting-pattern-aqua-layette-set-1 html 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/knit-kit-lullaby-layette
